sentence: The bathroom was a reasonable size but the handbasin did not drain properly and we had to get a maintenance man to cure it
Hotel is undergoing renovation so half of the restaurants were closed but the food we had was good
Bokingcom should clearly label properties under renovation so customer can choose to book or not
It is partially getting renovated now so be sure to ask for the Tower that is not being renovated or have to bare with the noise
But west wing need renovation sometimes in lift do not work card that sings have to be improve
First day due to renovation there is no warm water but they acomodate this issue by giving me another room for shower
Even with the renovations going on in the west wing the place feels busy but clean and efficient
The hotel was average it really need to be refurbish
Its anoying we had to call maintenance n room service few times

its just 10 minutes walk from the towers and located in the city center the hotel has 2 wings and some pat of it are renewed the pool is not very big but its ok the hotel has a massage center but its not easy to find it the restaurants in the hotel are very good and the food was perfectthe staff are very kind and helpful but like all Asian countries you may have some difficulty for talking in English
They did FINALLY have someone take my bags which was great considering all All check ins were in the east lobby but the remodeled rooms were in the west
Overall I think the hotel would be much better after the present renovation has completed
I am sure after the renovation it will stop looking dated and will offer even a better productchers
It is better to book rooms in the West Wing it is new one and better renovated
At the moment only the west wing is renovated but only the front desk in the east tower is staffed
The pool was nice but probably not recently updated
Very good sized but it looked very tired and bad decor not sure if the east wing is due to a refit because it needs one
We stayed in the West Wing which had undergone a refurb but really was not finished to a high standard
2nd returned to this hotel for our anniversary and wana try out their newly renovated Deluxe Room
West wing recently renovated but honestly lacks some caracter its a bit dull
Upon check in we were upgraded to a suite which was in the renovated wing of the hotel with massive windows overlooking the KL Tower
Newly renovated club lounge is great and the view is just spectacular with both the twin towers and KL tower
West Wing rooms are complete renovated with views on KL Tower
Decent hotel recently renovated parts are bit better than the older wing
Nowsaday renisance hotel has renovations
Very good maintenance and food is so delicious and staff is so polite
Beautiful renovated west wing
Loved our time in the water and was refreshing in the KL heat
Rooms were renovated and comfortable
Great location nice new refurbished rooms very good and rich breakfast
